My intention would be to tell the customer that he's been sent a
"customer"=
, in JSON format.

What is a "customer", well - that would agreed upon by w=
hatever contact
your service has.  Whether "customer" is something that get=
s IANA
registered as having a specific set of attributes or locally "regist=
ered"
for your service/enterprise, such as you would ( or should ) register=
 link
rel types.

I'd see this is a vague intermediary step - just as a cli=
ent makes
assumptions based on a spec on what following a link rel of "edit=
" may
return, so two could the assumptions of parsing a "customer" object.
=

If need be - the header could specialized further with:

Content-Dispositi=
on: inline; concept=3Dcustomer; version=3D1.2; schema=3Dhttp://
.....custom=
er12.xsd


-- 
"Great artists are extremely selfish and arrogant things" =
=E2=80=94 Steven Wilson,
Porcupine Tree
